body: Hi Mostapha, compliments for the plug-in very interesting and complete. I have simulated this type of shading device composed by perforated alluminium sheet (in attached you can find an example). I have the features of the these alluminium panel such as RGB and percentage open area and i set up like trans material. But i don't succeed to link these type of material on their surface and create HB surface.  In this case trans material with shading device. What component i have to use in these analysis. I hope I shall be clear Thank you so much. Cheers Andrea
